name: Space Gems
description:
Space Gems

Controls

Left and Right Trigger to Rotate Ship.

Press A to accelerate.

Press B to shoot hookshot.

Press X to restart when game is over.

Description

Simple game where the goal is to collect as many gems as possible before time runs out.

You need to stay alive until the timer runs out to see your final score!

You can only collect gems of the same color, hit a gem with your hookshot and it will link it to your ship but be careful, hooking it up will also push it and you could start a chain reaction.

You will get damage if you touch a gem, even if you have collected it, asteroids damage the ship too.

If you get hit by a gem of a different color, you'll lose all of your gems!, if you get hit by a gem of the same color, you'll only lose that one.

The game starts with some gems but there's a "Black Hole" constantly shooting more gems .

I didn't have time to make any assets, so everything is made with spheres, capsules, cubes etc...

I hope you have fun with this little prototype! and let's see how many you can collect!

Thanks!
